ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2002_01_10:
I’ve been waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s have a
blast today!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2003_01_10: Let’s fire up this Trainer Lodge with a chat!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2101_01_10: Here, take this if you want!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2101_02_10:
It’s nothing special, but I wanted to show
my support.
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2102_01_10:
It’s present time! This is from me,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2102_02_10: Remember, I’ll always be by your side!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2103_01_10:
Here, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
The greatest gift for the greatest of friends!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2103_02_10:
Spending each day with you makes me
feel complete!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2103_03_10:
Let’s keep the fire going—as the greatest
of friends!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2201_01_10: All right! Shall we have a chat?
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2203_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let’s let it all
out—have a real heart-to-heart!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2301_01_10: Oh wow... This gift is the greatest!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2301_02_10:
Thank you from the bottom of my heart,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ll take good
care of it!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2402_01_10:
That was fun, but our time is up! Let’s chat
again sometime!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8201_2401_02_10: I felt like I was back in the stadium!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8001_0701_01_10:
It feels great to stand in the middle of a
roaring stadium...
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8001_0701_02_10:
But it’s also nice to take it easy like this
sometimes!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8002_0701_01_10:
The way I see it, it’s possible to teach
someone to become stronger.
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8002_0701_02_10:
But there’s more than one path to strength!
It’s OK to get lost sometimes!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8002_0701_03_10:
The trail you leave behind with each step
you take will be your own unique path!
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8003_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I wish I could return to when
I was just starting out as a Trainer like you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8003_0701_02_10:
After all, you can only experience growing
strong from nothing once.
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8003_0701_03_10:
Huh? You say you CAN experience it more
than once?
ch0247_00_dande_salon/8003_0701_04_10:
You may be right! Maybe I’ll challenge
myself to something new sometime!
